means: 潜水( dive的第三人称单数 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: In the springboard event , men take eleven dives , women take ten dives ., 跳板项目中 , 男子跳 11 个动作 , 女子跳 10 个动作.
prolonged dives and other tricks take little longer master , but most pilots are proficient in a couple of days .要精通长时间潜水技术和其它复杂技巧，需要花费较长的时间，但是大部分驾驶员能在数天内完成课程。
When it dives its heart slows to half its normal speed., 当它潜水时 , 它的心跳速度就减慢到正常心速的一半.
There one plate dives under the edge of another and is reincorporated into the mantle ., 一道中海脊是板块之间的边界 , 在那里新的岩石圈的物质从下部注入.

进出口行业词汇英语翻译(D) ... diving shoes 潜水鞋 diving suit 潜水服 diving support vessel 潜水给养船.

entry.def: If you dive into some water, you jump in head-first with your arms held straight above your head.

example.ex: He tried to escape by diving into a river...
She was standing by a pool, about to dive in...
example.tran: 她站在水池旁边，正要往里跳。

entry.def: If you dive, you go under the surface of the sea or a lake, using special breathing equipment.

example.ex: Bezanik is diving to collect marine organisms.
example.tran: 贝扎尼奇正在潜水采集海洋生物。

entry.tran: (鸟或动物)俯冲，急速下扑(或下潜)
entry.def: When birds and animals dive, they go quickly downwards, head-first, through the air or through water.

example.ex: ...a pelican which had just dived for a fish...
example.tran: 刚刚潜入水中捕鱼的鹈鹕

example.ex: The shark dived down and swam under the boat.
example.tran: 鲨鱼急速潜入水中，在船下游动。

entry.def: If an aeroplane dives, it flies or drops down quickly and suddenly.

example.ex: He was killed when his monoplane stalled and dived into the ground.
example.tran: 他因驾驶的单翼飞机失速坠地而丧生。

entry.def: If you dive in a particular direction or into a particular place, you jump or move there quickly.

example.tran: 他们迅速钻进一辆出租车。

example.ex: The cashier dived for cover when a gunman opened fire...
example.tran: 出纳员在持枪歹徒开枪时冲向藏身处。

entry.tran: 迅速将手伸入(包或容器中)
entry.def: If you dive into a bag or container, you put your hands into it quickly in order to get something out.

example.ex: She dived into her bag and brought out a folded piece of paper.
example.tran: 她立即将手伸入包中拿出一张折好的纸。

entry.def: If shares, profits, or figures dive, their value falls suddenly and by a large amount.

example.ex: If we cut interest rates, the pound would dive...
example.tran: 如果我们降低利率，英镑就会大幅贬值。
利润从770万英镑暴跌至710万英镑。

entry.def: If you describe a bar or club as a dive, you mean it is dirty and dark, and not very respectable.

example.ex: We've played in all the little pubs and dives around Liverpool.
example.tran: 我们在利物浦所有的小酒吧和低级夜总会演出过。

auth_sentence.content: So expect plenty more dives, elbows and stamps.

auth_sentence.res_content: Like all cormorants its dives for its food.

auth_sentence.content: Dives are made from either springboards or platforms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dives are made from either springboards or platforms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dives are made from either springboards or platforms.
